title: eBay Admin Assistant
job_overview:
At Jara Trading, we specialize in sourcing and selling a wide range of quality products through trusted e-commerce platforms like eBay. Based in the UK, we’re committed to excellent customer service, fast delivery, and competitive pricing. As we continue to grow, we’re looking for a reliable and dedicated eBay Admin Assistant to help us manage our operations and listings efficiently.

Job Description:
We are looking for a highly organized and detail-oriented eBay Admin Assistant to support our online business operations. This role involves managing product listings, handling customer messages, and performing general administrative tasks.

Responsibilities:
Create, edit, and optimize eBay product listings
Monitor and respond to customer inquiries/messages in a timely manner
Process orders, returns, and refunds
Conduct competitor and market research
Ensure accurate inventory tracking and updates

Qualifications:
Proven experience with eBay seller accounts or similar e-commerce platforms
Strong attention to detail and organizational skills
Excellent written and verbal English communication skills
Proficient in Google Workspace, Excel, and other admin tools
Must be able to work UK graveyard shift (5:00 PM – 1:00 AM PH Time)
Ability to work independently with minimal supervision
Reliable internet connection and work-from-home setup

How to Apply:
Please send your application with the subject line: “eBay – [Your Name]”

We’re excited to grow our team and would love to hear from you!
